name: Capybara Nation
description: Capybara Nation merges the excitement of Web3 gaming with the simplicity of Telegram. Powered by cutting-edge blockchain technology, it makes decentralized gaming fun, accessible, and rewarding for everyone. Leveraging Telegramâ€™s massive user base, Capybara Nation is here to onboard the masses into Web3. The game combines strategic upgrades with community-driven gameplay, allowing players to earn in-game coins, level up their quest cards, and maximize profits. Invite friends to unlock special tasks and reap additional rewards, making collaboration the heart of the game.
